SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.face

Interface Face

All Superinterfaces:
AlphabeticalGroup<Vertex>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColoredFace
public interface Face extends AlphabeticalGroup<Vertex>, Serializable
A triangular face in 3D. Faces are used to define the outer surface of an object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Face
    apply(UnaryOperator<Vertex> operator)
    Applies given operator to each vertex of this face, then returns the resulting face.
    Vertex
    getA()
    Returns the first vertex of this face.
    Vertex
    getB()
    Returns the second vertex of this face.
    Vertex
    getC()
    Returns the third vertex of this face.
    Vector3
    getCentroid()
    Returns the geometric centroid of this face.
    Vector3
    getIntersection(Ray incidentRay)
    Given an incident ray, this returns the intersection between this face and the given ray.
    Vector3
    getNormal()
    Returns the surface normal vertex of this face.
    Vector3
    getReflectionVector(Vector3 incidentVector)
    Given an incident vector, this returns the reflection vector if the vector were to collide with this face.
    static Face
    parseFace(String input)
    Deserializes a string into a face.
    String
    toString()
    Serializes this face into a string.

    • getIntersection

      @Nullable Vector3 getIntersection(@Nonnull Ray incidentRay)
      Given an incident ray, this returns the intersection between this face and the given ray. If an intersection is not found, this returns null.
      Parameters:
      incidentRay - The incident ray
      Returns:
      The point of intersection if found, null if not

    • getReflectionVector

      @Nonnull Vector3 getReflectionVector(@Nonnull Vector3 incidentVector)
      Given an incident vector, this returns the reflection vector if the vector were to collide with this face.
      Parameters:
      incidentVector - The incident directional vector
      Returns:
      The reflection vector
